decks.notes: The main concept of this Orzhov Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of low-cost creatures and efficient removal spells. By utilizing cards like Tithing Blade and Lembas to pump up creatures, and Refurbished Familiar to return creatures from the graveyard, this deck aims to establish early board presence and maintain pressure on the opponent. With a mix of flying creatures like Kor Skyfisher and Glint Hawk, along with solid removal options like Cast Down and Suffocating Fumes, this deck is designed to be aggressive and versatile in combat.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to overwhelm and disrupt opponents with a low mana curve and creatures that have evasion abilities. By utilizing cards like Spellstutter Sprite for counter spells and Faerie Miscreant for card draw, the deck aims to maintain board presence while controlling the pace of the game. The inclusion of Moon-Circuit Hacker and Ninja of the Deep Hours provides additional card advantage and potential for quick damage. Overall, the strategy revolves around being aggressive and maintaining tempo throughout the game.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures and spells, aiming to deal damage quickly and efficiently. With a focus on low-cost creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Goblin Tomb Raider, along with powerful burn spells like Chain Lightning and Lightning Bolt, this deck is designed to maintain pressure and control the pace of the game. By utilizing efficient creatures and burn spells, the deck seeks to end the game before the opponent can establish a strong defense or stabilize the board.

This deck focuses on quickly cycling through cards to fill the graveyard with creatures and spells, then utilizing cards like Reaping the Graves and Songs of the Damned to bring them back for a powerful combo finish. The goal is to set up a chain of spells and abilities that generate massive amounts of mana and create a deadly board presence that overwhelms the opponent. Utilizing efficient cycling cards and graveyard recursion, this deck aims to establish a dominating position and win the game in a single explosive turn.

This deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, with a secondary focus on sacrificing artifacts to gain value and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It aims to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure while efficiently removing threats and maintaining card advantage. By leveraging the synergy between artifacts, sacrifice effects, and burn spells, the deck seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in a fast-paced and explosive manner.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deploy low-costed creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent, backed up by a suite of counterspells and card draw to maintain tempo advantage. Utilizing cards like Consider, Brainstorm, and Thought Scour to dig for threats and protect them with spells like Counterspell and Dispel, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient threats and disruption. Lórien Revealed and Tolarian Terror provide additional utility and synergy with the deck's overall game plan.

This deck focuses on using cards like Dread Return and Exhume to quickly bring powerful creatures like Lotleth Giant and Troll of Khazad-dûm back from the graveyard. Supporting cards like Conduit Pylons and Scrapwork Mutt help facilitate the reanimation strategy, while cards like Gnaw to the Bone provide graveyard recursion and defense. The deck also includes some aggressive creatures like Blanchwood Prowler and Rubblebelt Maverick to apply pressure early on. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures brought back from the graveyard to secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with various elf creatures and utilizing cards like Nettle Sentinel and Quirion Ranger to generate additional resources. The goal is to flood the board with elves and use cards like Timberwatch Elf to pump up the team for a quick and overwhelming assault on the opponent. Lead the Stampede and Distant Melody allow for card draw to maintain momentum and Nyxborn Hydra provides a powerful finisher. Wellwisher helps to stabilize against aggressive opponents.

This deck focuses on quickly damaging the opponent using low-cost spells and creatures in the Aggro archetype. It utilizes cards like Alms of the Vein, Fiery Temper, and Lightning Bolt to deal direct damage, while also taking advantage of efficient creatures like Kitchen Imp and Sneaky Snacker. The deck includes a mix of black and red cards to maximize versatility and aggression. With a focus on speed and relentless pressure, it aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize or mount a defense.
